report.title: Pharm Poetry
report.author: Evan L
report.bodytext: I swallowed 25 mg's of oxycodone at 7:30. At 9 o'clock I was feeling euphoric and in the mood to write how I felt. Extreme beauty and the feeling that everything was getting better swarmed around me. I was also taking Effexor 150 mg's and Risperdal .5mg's daily for my depression. I also smoked two black and mild cigars while writing. Here is what I wrote.. /n /n Warm waves slip into my heart, /n My eyes close and enter sweet slumber. /n Smoke rises from a joy-filled plain. /n The cold of the night doesn't enter me, /n Yet gains awareness that I don't grasp for it. /n Fuzzy cottonballs replace my bone. /n They cozily fit together to form my body. /n The starless night still seems bright, /n Unevading and calm the moon does appear. /n No news could change my state of mind. /n The moon then creates a spotlight on me. /n Everything working for me is ten times as clear, /n And the negative things cease to exist. /n Time drives by in bundles as I smile. /n Lights gain a mysterious glow. /n My limbs move in a warm fire of hope. /n Yet my skin stays in a radiant way. /n Clear are my thoughts and ambitions. /n My eyes are starlit as if another universe is inside me, /n With only good to let the planets revolve. /n /n Towards the end of the experience, I felt better about myself. As if my current depression had been swept away. All and all, I had a very pleasant time. It was the best Halloween of my life..
